summary: This mod allow you to provide vanilla armors for children followers
descriptionHtml:
This is intended to be used with any mod that allows children followers.  It allows any vanilla armor worn by the children to be seen.  

Current armor sets include;
Hide
Leather
Imperial
Stormcloak (Including Guard Variants)
Steel
Elven
Dwarvish
Orcish
Ebony
Daedric
Dragon Plate
Dragon Steel

These sets will appear on Nord, Breton and Redguard children. Simply give the child the armor as you would any other follower and the armor will appear as with normal followers

This is my first nod please tell me if you have any problems or would like any additions
author: sthayes127
